subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: Over the past few weeks, running back LeGarrette Blount has burst into the national spotlight for the Patriots as they prepare to face the Broncos in the A.F.C. championship game.
snippet: Over the past few weeks, running back LeGarrette Blount has burst into the national spotlight for the Patriots as they prepare to face the Broncos in the A.F.C. championship game.
